name: Ninja Star: Web Motion Game Experiment
name_original: Ninja Star: Web Motion Game Experiment
description:
This game is using WebTorrent to pair devices. It probably doesn't work in some device/router. It will be helpful that you comment with detail if you can't pair your devices. So far, it seems both Android and iOS should work

I only used the last 3 days for the game jam so the graphic is quite a meh

Recommanded to play it in fullscreen

Pairing

  1. open the game in computer (technicially tablet can work too )
  2. use phone to scan qr code (qr code is runtime generated)
  3. if iphone, click left bottom to enable gyroscope

Gameplay

  1. shoot target to score
  2. shoot pole to make bridge
